title: Another unneeded inferior sequel but...
review:
At least this wasn't anti-woman and anti-female and the women were hot and thin.
They could have easily done a modern film where all the women are in baggy jump suits and obese and expect us to love it but at least they didn't hate on slender and attractive women. That's something these days.Of course it was a sequel and it was stupid and made little sense. I also have to say it is time for Ford to retire.
